body: The trick I think would be a new party, based on strong constitutional rights (restore our rights immediately) and giving the middle finger to the GOP. That's still a possibility, but it will become increasingly difficult with media and social media censorship. The Tea Party movement failed for this reason. There is easily enough public support for such a movement if someone wrote a good enough platform and could actually get it out without being hijacked.
body_html: The trick I think would be a new party, based on strong constitutional rights (restore our rights immediately) and giving the middle finger to the GOP. That's still a possibility, but it will become increasingly difficult with media and social media censorship. The Tea Party movement failed for this reason. There is easily enough public support for such a movement if someone wrote a good enough platform and could actually get it out without being hijacked.

body:
I support letting the embassies decide for themselves.

If there's a pride march in Copenhagen and every embassy is flying the pride flag for the day except the U.S., Russia, and the Middle Eastern countries, I think the optics of that really suck.
